text_block_list.name: Previous Researcher
text_block_list.text:
…… Recovering the broken prototype? Go ahead. 
But don't ye be countin' on me.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Appreciated. And excuse me, one more thing… 
Would it be possible to borrow your towing vehicle?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Hey, hey, how far did it fly!? 
Did you reach the clouds? Were they fluffy!?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: T-Turbo dear, can you ask one at a time…?

text_block_list.name: Previous Researcher
text_block_list.text: Hmph… Wassat, you wanna fly a plane?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Fly one, yeah! Make one, yeah! I'm so excited! 
I wanna know how cool the new ones are!

text_block_list.name: Previous Researcher
text_block_list.text:
Hahah, well…… I can see yer eyes twinkle. 
…… Reminds me of when I met her.

text_block_list.name: Previous Researcher
text_block_list.text: But… I ain't seen her look too twinkly of late……

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
! 
You're still looking over her?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Then why don't you call out to her! She'd be so happy! 
And it'd probably stimulate her research!

text_block_list.name: Previous Researcher
text_block_list.text: … That's why I ain't talking to her. Nothing good's gonna come from me bothering her…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
I get it… you think your presence might be a 
burden to her and are trying to stay out of her way…

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: …… Really?

text_block_list.name: Previous Researcher
text_block_list.text:
…… I don't wanna saddle her with all of this. 
But somewhere deep down, I find myself hoping…

text_block_list.name: Previous Researcher
text_block_list.text:
That she can get it done, seeing how hard 
she believes in reaching her dreams…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: You have high hopes for her.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: And you're right, big expectations can be a real burden.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
That weight, pulling you down at times… 
So I get why you don't want to disturb her.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
The thing with high hopes and expectations is they can 
crash down on you harder when things don't work out…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: … I know that, but even so—

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
No matter how heavy they were, I was happier to carry 
their weight than not feeling them at all. I wanted people 
to expect things from me! To put their hopes on me!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
The desire to live up to them was how 
I was able to carry forward!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
They're heavy, but that's exactly why— 
Why you can stand strong, and find the 
power not to be crushed by their weight!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Prez also waited on me, believing I could do it.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
What about you? Do you not believe in her? 
Do you think she'll give in to the pressure so easily?

text_block_list.name: Previous Researcher
text_block_list.text:
………Don't be silly. I know she'll put her back into any 
work entrusted to her over and over until it's flawless. 
I don't know anyone with more determination.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Hehe, is that so? Besides, you know, she has us super geniuses to help her!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
That's right!! Turbo's helping on full power! 
So there's nothing to worry about!!

text_block_list.name: Previous Researcher
text_block_list.text: Hhff… the heck? — It was the truck you wanted, yeah? Come with me.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Now that is… quite the amount of rust…! 
… Does this even move anymore…?

text_block_list.name: Previous Researcher
text_block_list.text:
Just about. If you can get it going somehow, there's a 
good chance. The thing just needs a lot of power to start up.

text_block_list.name: Previous Researcher
text_block_list.text:
It ain't that hard either, just give it a push until it starts. 
But you do need to push it in just the right direction.

text_block_list.name: Previous Researcher
text_block_list.text:
And that ain't happening with the lot of ya. Gotta do it alone. 
… Of course, it's dang heavy, so that's quite the job…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Turbo's up for it!! I wanna do it! 
All I have to do is push!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
If there's a chance, of course we'll do it! 
So spin up that turbo for us, Double Jet!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Twin Turbo!! 
How do you get it wrong when you just said turbo!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: On with it!! Dooyaaaaaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Fuguguguguugu……!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Haah, haah, haahh… blasted thing!! Putting up a fight! But Turbo's super duper gonna fly that plane! No way I'll give up here!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Maximum Turboooo!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Oooooooooooo!! I'm—not—done—— yeeeet!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Her clothes changed!? 
—Oh, it must be that "EX Job Change"!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Aha, the one time use skill function! 
And that's the… Booster class!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Hmph! Unh-unhunhunh～～～～! Ghuuuuugh……! Nnnh…!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Her class has jetpacks and it still won't budge!?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Oh! It! Will!! Fughughughu～ Turbo's gonna get this truck started!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Start truck! Fly plane!! 
Move it, you. Move move move moooooove～～!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Turbo……!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Turbo can't lose! Won't lose! Won't give up!! Whihihihihihi, the battle only just started!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Hmgh……… gghuhurraaaauuggghh!!
(Clank!! Vvvmmmm…!)

text_block_list.name: All 4
text_block_list.text: It started!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: That's riiiight! Let's goooo!!
